cmd.kit.claim.error.not-found: A kit named %s does not exist.
cmd.kit.claim.error.insufficient-playing: In order to get kit '%s', you need to play %d %s on the server. There are %dh %dm left.
cmd.kit.claim.error.one-time-use: Kit %s can only be retrieved once.
cmd.kit.reset-all.feedback: All kits reloads are reset for the %s.
cmd.kit.reset-kit.feedback: Kit '%s' reloads are reset for the %s.
